org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.example

Class TestDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.example.TestDriver

  • public class TestDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a test driver for testing akka-raft implementation Its uses ExampleActors and threads to push content(key-vals) to these actors Each ExampleActor can have one or more ClientActors. Each ClientActor spawns a thread and starts push logs to the actor its assigned to.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Create nodes, add clients and start logging. Commands bye createNodes:{num} stopNode:{nodeName} reinstateNode:{nodeName} addClients:{num} addClientsToNode:{nodeName, num} startLogging stopLogging startLoggingForClient:{nodeName} stopLoggingForClient:{nodeName} printNodes printState Note: when run on IDE and on debug log level, the debug logs in AbstractUptypedActor and AbstractUptypedPersistentActor would need to be commented out. Also RaftActor handleCommand(), debug log which prints for every command other than AE/AER

        args -
